name: amplify-brightspace-integration
description: Brightspace API integration for Amplify project at Vanderbilt University

scripts.test-amplify: node -e "const AmplifyClient = require('./src/amplify-client'); const client = new AmplifyClient(); client.processFile({name:'test.txt', type:'text/plain', buffer:Buffer.from('test')}).then(console.log);"

author: Max Moundas
